FOUND IN: Newborn rabbits: This term directly refers to the young offspring of hares, which are called leverets.
Nymph: Refers to young insects that undergo incomplete metamorphosis, gradually developing wing pads and eventually maturing into adults.
Wrekin Hills (nearly equidistant from both Shropshire and Staffordshire, but not directly in Telford)
Assassination: A premeditated, politically motivated killing
